Contact Yvonne

Your dog will be all smiles and happy tails.

‚ùù

Both animals and humans have a lot of fun while learning and training. Your dog will be all smiles and happy tails for these stimulating and supportive sessions. Most importantly, we always end the training session on a successful note.

Initial Assessment.

First step to observe how the pets and owners interact in their home environment.

This initial session is charged at a flat rate to allow for enough time to truly understand the dynamics and behaviours of the pack.

From this basic assessment, I offer initial tips and advice to start correcting unwanted behaviour.

We will discuss training options that meet each individual client's time schedule and budget.

Techniques & Skills.

  • On leash and off-leash walking
  • Recall
  • Agility Training
  • Dog and other species socialising
  • Challenge and stimulation, such as sniffer training

Contact me.

Contact me for an initial assessment. Please note I am unable to take calls during training, so it is usually better to send me a message via SMS or What's App.

What's App me

SMS me
